message: Undid revision 1016009871 by [[Special:Contributions/Pupsterlove02|Pupsterlove02]] ([[User talk:Pupsterlove02|talk]]) please see previous comments and avoid adding unreferenced material.

Undid revision 1016001859 by [[Special:Contributions/Allninemice|Allninemice]] ([[User talk:Allninemice|talk]]) regardless of how a person calls himself, grammatical rules should be followed, as applied by universities and doctorate scholars. If a person calls himself a dolphin, it does not change that he is a human. Besides quotes, grammatical rules should be followed otherwise it will be chaotic and there would be no point going to school.
Undid revision 1015999708 by [[Special:Contributions/24.21.205.135|24.21.205.135]] ([[User talk:24.21.205.135|talk]]) please do not add unreferenced or poorly referenced material.
/* Early life and education */ removed a misplaced word.
/* Early life and education */ added reference.
/* Early life and education */ added reference to the correct grammatical use of pronouns.

Undid revision 1015993768 by [[Special:Contributions/Allninemice|Allninemice]] ([[User talk:Allninemice|talk]]) . A "he" pronoun is to be used following a person's gender, not by it's legal status. The legal name change does not change a pronoun according to grammatical use in every dictionnary. See attached references and please stop threatening me.

/* Early life and education */ minor grammatical changes according to the Merriam-Webster and English Grammar in Use fourth edition. https://www.cambridge.org/us/cambridgeenglish/catalog/grammar-vocabulary-and-pronunciation/english-grammar-use-4th-edition . https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/dictionary .
/* Suspected sockpuppets */ please do not accuse without proof.

Undid revision 1016010491 by [[Special:Contributions/Pupsterlove02|Pupsterlove02]] ([[User talk:Pupsterlove02|talk]]) regardless of your or dragun's opinion, proper grammar has to be followed. Please stop spamming, thank you.

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Kairos604|Kairos604]]: Please see [[MOS:GENDERID]]. "Refer to any person whose gender might be questioned with gendered words (e.g. pronouns ... ) that reflect the person's latest expressed gender self-identification as reported in the most up-to-date reliable sources ...". Dragun identifies as female, and should be referred to as such. These sources make no reference to Dragun's pronouns or gender identity, only to personal pronouns in general.

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Kairos604|Kairos604]] ([[User talk:Kairos604|talk]]): Changing she to he throughout the article isn't exactly a minor change. Please provide a [[WP:RS|reliable source]] if you are changing a [[WP:BLP|person]]'s gender/pronouns/etc.
